messages.message: FYI @hannah @Bastiane @Clemens to dig into this requirement more and add to the product backlog for Q3
@shaunak - What all we would have to do to support this deployment configuration? We can then estimate how much additional effort is required.

This is basically akin to deployment in their VPC and switching out the OpenAI provider.  This is doable; Anant and I already had a chat around this.  However, we need to be pushing away folks from deploying in their VPC as much as possible.

An alternative could be: Run Instabase in SaaS, but use the customerâ€™s configured OpenAI services.  [Similar to how we would be setting up our own SaaS model]
